subject: New health insurance enrollment
description: I'm from the former GreenTech company and I'm confused about the new health insurance options. My old plan had dental included but I don't see that in the new PinHigh benefits portal. Can someone explain what's covered now?

subject: PTO policy clarification needed
description: At my previous company (Summit Corp), we had unlimited PTO. Now I'm seeing accrual rates in the system. How many days do I actually get per year under the new policy?

subject: Can't access new payroll system
description: I'm trying to log into the new Workday system but my credentials from the old ADP system don't work. I need to update my direct deposit information before next pay period.

subject: 401k rollover assistance
description: I had a 401k with my previous company Summit Corp with a 6% match. What's PinHigh's match policy and how do I roll over my existing account?

subject: Office hoteling system broken
description: The new office booking system isn't working. I'm from the Apex Seattle office and we never had assigned desks. Now I can't figure out how to reserve a workspace for tomorrow.

subject: Laptop replacement request - urgent
description: My GreenTech laptop is 4 years old and barely functions. What's the new policy for equipment replacement? Do I need manager approval or can I request directly through IT?

subject: New expense policy questions
description: I have a client dinner tonight and I'm not sure what the expense limits are anymore. At Summit we could expense up to $150 per person, what's the new policy?

subject: Performance review timeline
description: When are performance reviews happening? At GreenTech we did them in March but I heard PinHigh does them quarterly. I need to know so I can prepare.

subject: VPN not connecting
description: I can't connect to the VPN using my old Summit credentials. I work from home 3 days a week and need access to the shared drives urgently.

subject: Parental leave policy information
description: I'm expecting a baby in June. What's PinHigh's parental leave policy? At Apex we had 12 weeks - is that still the case?

subject: New email signature format
description: What's the proper email signature format now? Should I still use my old Apex branding or is there a new PinHigh template?

subject: Stock options conversion
description: I had stock options from Summit Corp that were vesting. How are these being converted in the merger? I can't find any documentation on this.

subject: Remote work policy clarification
description: GreenTech allowed fully remote work. What's PinHigh's policy? Do I need to come into the office now?

subject: Access to finance shared drive
description: I need access to the finance drive for Q4 reporting but I'm getting access denied errors. At Summit I had automatic access as a finance team member.

subject: New org chart - where do I report?
description: My manager from GreenTech left during the merger. Who do I report to now? The org chart link in the email doesn't work.

subject: Professional development budget
description: Does PinHigh offer professional development stipends? At Apex I had $2000 annually for courses and conferences.

subject: Password reset - locked out
description: I've been locked out of all systems after trying to log in with my old GreenTech password too many times. Need urgent reset.

subject: Severance package question
description: Several colleagues from Summit were let go. What's the severance policy? I'm worried about job security.

subject: New badge access not working
description: My new PinHigh badge doesn't open the doors on the 5th floor where my team sits. Still using my Apex badge.

subject: Relocation assistance policy
description: I'm being asked to relocate from the Summit Chicago office to PinHigh HQ in Denver. What relocation benefits are available?

subject: Tuition reimbursement eligibility
description: I'm enrolled in an MBA program. Does PinHigh offer tuition reimbursement like GreenTech did?

subject: Bonus structure changes
description: What happened to our quarterly bonuses? At Summit we got performance bonuses every quarter. Is this still happening?

subject: New CRM system training needed
description: We've switched from Salesforce to HubSpot. When is training being offered? I can't figure out how to log my sales calls.

subject: Life insurance coverage amounts
description: My life insurance coverage seems lower than what I had at Apex. Can I increase it and what are the new rates?

subject: Sick leave vs PTO confusion
description: At GreenTech, sick leave was separate from PTO. Now it seems like it's all combined. Does this mean my sick days count against vacation?

subject: Cell phone stipend missing
description: I used to get a $100/month cell phone stipend at Summit. I don't see this in my last paycheck. Is this benefit continuing?

subject: New time tracking system issues
description: The new time tracking system keeps logging me out. This is critical as I bill clients hourly and need accurate records.

subject: Gym membership reimbursement
description: Apex reimbursed up to $75/month for gym memberships. Does PinHigh have a wellness program?

subject: Company car policy for sales
description: I'm in sales and had a company car at Summit. What's PinHigh's policy on this? Do I need to return my current vehicle?

subject: Mental health benefits coverage
description: Does the new insurance cover therapy sessions? At GreenTech I had 20 sessions covered annually.

subject: Commission structure changes
description: My commission structure seems different from what I had at Apex. The rates are lower. Was this communicated? I need clarification ASAP.

subject: Office closure calendar
description: Which holidays is the office closed? Each legacy company had different holiday schedules. What's the unified calendar?

subject: New manager introduction request
description: I've been assigned a new manager from the former Summit team but haven't been introduced. Can someone facilitate a meeting?

subject: Retirement plan contribution limits
description: I was maxing out my 401k at Apex. What are the contribution limits under the new plan?

subject: Software licenses - Adobe Creative
description: I need Adobe Creative Cloud for my role but my old GreenTech license was deactivated. How do I get a new license?

subject: Severance calculation method
description: If there are future layoffs what's the severance calculation? At Summit it was 2 weeks per year of service.

subject: New corporate credit card
description: When will we receive new PinHigh corporate cards? My old Apex card expires next month.

subject: Referral bonus program
description: Does PinHigh have an employee referral bonus? GreenTech paid $3000 per successful hire.

subject: Parking pass for new office
description: I've been moved to the Denver HQ. How do I get a parking pass? At the Summit office parking was included.

subject: Stock purchase plan enrollment
description: Is there an employee stock purchase plan? Summit had one with 15% discount.

subject: Lactation room access
description: I'm returning from maternity leave. Where are the lactation rooms at the new PinHigh office? Apex had dedicated rooms.

subject: New benefits enrollment deadline
description: I missed the benefits enrollment email. What's the deadline and can I get an extension?

subject: Dependent care FSA
description: Can I still contribute to a dependent care FSA? I don't see it listed in the new benefits portal.

subject: Company laptop return process
description: I have my old GreenTech laptop and a new PinHigh one. Where do I return the old equipment?

subject: Manager approval workflow changes
description: The approval process for expenses seems different. Do I still route through my direct manager or is there a new system?

subject: Bereavement leave policy
description: What's the bereavement leave policy? My grandfather passed away and at Summit we had 5 days.

subject: New office seating assignments
description: Where is my assigned desk? The floor plan shows my team in a different area than where GreenTech sat.

subject: Annual salary review timing
description: When do salary reviews happen? At Apex it was in January but we're already mid-February.

subject: Overtime policy for hourly employees
description: I'm an hourly employee from Summit. What's the overtime approval process? We used to be able to work OT freely.

subject: New project management tool
description: We've switched to Monday.com from Asana. Is there training available? I have active projects I need to migrate.

subject: HSA contribution limits
description: I want to maximize my HSA contributions. What are the annual limits under the new plan?

subject: Company laptop specs inadequate
description: The standard PinHigh laptop is slower than what I had at Summit. I'm a software developer and need more RAM.

subject: Dress code policy
description: What's the dress code? GreenTech was very casual but I've noticed people dressing more formally.

subject: Confidential HR matter
description: I need to speak with HR confidentially about a workplace issue. Who do I contact? My old Apex HR rep is gone.

subject: New travel booking system
description: How do I book business travel? At Summit we used Concur but I can't find the new system.

subject: Vision insurance coverage
description: Is vision insurance included or separate? At GreenTech it was bundled with medical.

subject: Patent/IP policy for engineers
description: I developed some code at Apex. What's PinHigh's IP policy? Do I need to disclose this?

subject: Long-term disability coverage
description: What's the LTD coverage amount? I want to purchase supplemental coverage if needed.

subject: Company social events budget
description: At GreenTech our team had a quarterly budget for team building. Does this still exist?

subject: New performance management system
description: What's the new performance review system? At Summit we used a 5-point scale but I'm seeing something different.

subject: Sabbatical leave policy
description: Does PinHigh offer sabbaticals? Apex allowed them after 7 years of service.

subject: Equipment stipend for remote workers
description: I work remotely and bought my own monitor at GreenTech. Does PinHigh reimburse home office equipment?

subject: New hire referral - status check
description: I referred someone 3 weeks ago. How do I check the status? At Summit we had a tracking portal.

subject: Customer data access - GDPR
description: I need access to customer data for my role but I'm getting compliance warnings. What's the new GDPR training requirement?

subject: Floating holidays policy
description: How many floating holidays do we get? This wasn't clear in the new policy document.

subject: Commuter benefits program
description: Does PinHigh offer pre-tax commuter benefits? I took the train daily at Summit and this saved me significant money.

subject: New security badge photo
description: My badge photo is from 2019. Can I get a new one taken? The photo quality is terrible.

subject: Shift differential pay
description: I work night shifts and at GreenTech received shift differential. Is this continuing?

subject: New company values and mission
description: Where can I find information about PinHigh's values and mission? I need this for a client presentation.

subject: Maternity leave return - flexible schedule
description: I'm returning from maternity leave and want to request part-time hours temporarily. What's the policy?

subject: Volunteer time off
description: Apex gave us 2 paid days annually for volunteering. Does PinHigh have a similar program?

subject: Legal name change process
description: I recently got married and need to change my name in all systems. What's the process?

subject: Company store access
description: Is there a company store for branded merchandise? Summit had one and I'd like to order items.

subject: New whistleblower hotline
description: What's the anonymous reporting hotline number? I can't find it in the new employee handbook.

subject: Disability accommodation request
description: I need an ergonomic chair due to back problems. What's the accommodation request process?

subject: Pet insurance benefit
description: Did the pet insurance benefit survive the merger? This was an Apex perk I really valued.

subject: New supplier vendor setup
description: I need to add a new vendor to the system for marketing services. The old GreenTech process isn't working.

subject: Background check for promotion
description: I'm being promoted to a role requiring additional background checks. How long does this take?

subject: EAP counseling services
description: Does the Employee Assistance Program include family counseling? I need support services for my teenager.

subject: Profit sharing distribution
description: When is profit sharing distributed? At Summit it was in March but I haven't heard anything.

subject: New company intranet login
description: I can't access the new SharePoint intranet. Getting error messages about permissions.

subject: Annual physical - wellness program
description: Does the wellness program still cover annual physicals? GreenTech reimbursed $150.

subject: Direct deposit change request
description: I need to split my paycheck between two accounts. The payroll portal won't let me add a second account.

subject: New compliance training deadline
description: I received 15 different compliance training assignments. What's the deadline? This seems excessive.

subject: Company car insurance proof
description: I need proof of insurance for my company vehicle for a client site visit tomorrow.

subject: Expense report rejected - need clarification
description: My expense report was rejected but I followed the old Apex policy. What changed?

subject: New hire buddy program
description: At GreenTech we had a buddy system for new employees. Does PinHigh have something similar?

subject: Stock vesting schedule confusion
description: My stock vesting schedule looks different in the new system. Can someone verify this is correct?

subject: New office coffee/snacks policy
description: Are snacks and coffee still provided? The break room at the merged office looks different.

subject: Employment verification letter
description: I need an employment verification letter for a mortgage application. What's the request process?

subject: Sales territory reassignment
description: My sales territory was changed without notification. At Summit we had defined territories. What's happening?

subject: New cybersecurity protocols
description: I keep getting locked out for security violations I don't understand. The protocols seem much stricter than at Apex.

subject: Jury duty pay policy
description: I have jury duty next week. Am I paid during this time? What's the policy?

subject: Team building budget approval
description: I want to organize a team outing. At Summit I had a $500 quarterly budget. What's the approval process now?

subject: New pricing guidelines access
description: I can't access the new pricing guidelines for client quotes. This is urgent as I have a proposal due today.

subject: Military leave policy
description: I'm in the reserves and have training next month. What's PinHigh's military leave policy?

subject: New manager 1-on-1 request
description: My new manager hasn't scheduled our 1-on-1 yet and it's been a month. How do I escalate this?

subject: Career development path
description: What's the career progression framework? At Apex we had clear IC and management tracks.

subject: Unpaid leave request process
description: I need to take 3 weeks unpaid leave for a family matter. What's the approval process and notice period?

subject: New employee handbook location
description: Where can I find the complete employee handbook? The links in the welcome email are broken.
